author: Ethan Kendall
review: Pipes froze went without running water for 10 days no restitution for equipment I bought to unthaw pipes slow to respond. Owners selling property gave me till end of lease to figure out new place to live found place a month early moving out

author: Graham Armstrong
review: We rented from Howard and Caroline for 5 years, and while their management style might not work for everyone, it was perfect for us. We were comfortable handling the majority of maintenance and repairs on our own,  and they were comfortable

author: Nick Hatch
review: I've been a tenant with Adams for over three years, and have been pleased with the no-nonsense approach they take with property management. Problems generally get fixed quickly, and they'll be a respectful and attentive landlord as long as

author: Sarah Ross-Morgan
review: I've lived in Whatcom county most of my life and I've rented from many property management groups, most are pretty fair. Truthfully Adams is the second worst (Lakeway wins first by a landslide- oi vey). This guy...I've never been so abused

author: Steven Shimko
review: Awesome landlords, always punctual when there are issues
